title: Analysis of University Professors' Technology Utilization Levels and Improvement Strategy Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic experience with educational technology tools and PBL (Project-Based Learning) project execution
context.additional_context: Learners conduct data collection and analysis projects using personal devices (BYOD) to strengthen instructional design competencies in language education

learning_goals: Learners can critically analyze survey tools that assess university professors' levels of technology utilization.
Learners can classify and interpret instructors' technology utilization types into four profiles based on survey data.
Learners can propose technology integration strategies applicable to language education settings based on analysis results.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
